comment: * Interface for receiving events about media routing changes.

methods.name: public void onRoutesAdded(@NonNull List<MediaRoute2Info> routes)
methods.comment:
* Called when routes are added.
         * @param routes the list of routes that have been added. It's never empty.

methods.name: public void onRoutesRemoved(@NonNull List<MediaRoute2Info> routes)
methods.comment:
* Called when routes are removed.
         * @param routes the list of routes that have been removed. It's never empty.

methods.name: public void onRoutesChanged(@NonNull List<MediaRoute2Info> routes)
methods.comment:
* Called when routes are changed.
         * @param routes the list of routes that have been changed. It's never empty.

methods.name: public void onSessionUpdated(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session)
methods.comment:
* Called when a session is changed.
         * @param session the updated session

methods.name: public void onSessionReleased(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session)
methods.comment:
* Called when a session is released.
         * @param session the released session.
         * @see #releaseSession(RoutingSessionInfo)

methods.name: public void onTransferred(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo oldSession, @Nullable RoutingSessionInfo newSession)
methods.comment:
* Called when media is transferred.
         *
         * @param oldSession the previous session
         * @param newSession the new session or {@code null} if the session is released.

methods.name: public void onTransferFailed(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session, @NonNull MediaRoute2Info route)
public void onPreferredFeaturesChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull List<String> preferredFeatures)
methods.comment:
* Called when the preferred route features of an app is changed.
         *
         * @param packageName the package name of the application
         * @param preferredFeatures the list of preferred route features set by an application.

methods.name: public void onRequestFailed(int reason)
methods.comment:
* Called when a previous request has failed.
         *
         * @param reason the reason that the request has failed. Can be one of followings:
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_UNKNOWN_ERROR},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_REJECTED},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_NETWORK_ERROR},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_ROUTE_NOT_AVAILABLE},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_INVALID_COMMAND},

methodNames: public void onTransferred(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo oldSession, @Nullable RoutingSessionInfo newSession)
public void onTransferFailed(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session, @NonNull MediaRoute2Info route)
public void onPreferredFeaturesChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull List<String> preferredFeatures)
